unnormalised: Hey everyone, solar rooftop subsidies are awesome! My cousin, Priya, in Bangalore got a huge discount. She said it barely cost her Rs. 50,000 after subsidy. Perfect timing before the summer heat hits! Now she can run her AC 24/7 and enjoy Onam with ice cold drinks. Hope more folks in India get this benefit!
normalised: Hey everyone, solar rooftop subsidies are awesome! My cousin, Priya, in Bangalore got a huge discount. She said it barely cost her rupee fifty thousand after subsidy. Perfect timing before the summer heat hits! Now she can run her A C twenty four seven and enjoy Onam with ice cold drinks. Hope more folks in India get this benefit!
